animeDescription: A manga comic book and anime television series by manga artist Go Nagai, made as a direct continuation of the successful Mazinger Z series. It was aired on Japan in 1974, immediately following the end of the first Mazinger series.
animeRelated: ['Great Mazinger', 'Mazinger Z', 'Great Mazinger tai Getter Robo', 'Great Mazinger tai Getter Robo G: Kuuchuu Daigekitotsu', 'God Mazinger', 'Mazinger Z Movie: Infinity']
